meanings.definition: A type of Indian sweet made from condensed milk and sugar.
meanings.sent1: I tried a piece of barfi at the Indian restaurant.
meanings.sent2: During Diwali, my mom always makes delicious barfi at home.
meanings.sent3: The barfi was so sweet, it made my teeth ache!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a piece of barfi, warm and inviting.
meanings.sent5: The barfi melted in my mouth, leaving a sugary aftertaste.

meanings.definition: To describe something as sweet or delicious.
meanings.sent1: She would always barfi her favorite desserts.
meanings.sent2: The chef loved to barfi his dishes to impress the guests.
meanings.sent3: He barfied the movie as the best he had ever seen.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter barfied the room, filling it with joy.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly baked cookies barfied the entire house.
